ModMetaData.name: The Price Is Right
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description:
Your Caravans trade closer to market price instead of the meager 2% caravan bonus
It's now a 30% bonus vs. a 50% selling penalty, so game difficulty and skill is still relevant.
Colonists on a caravan get Mood bonus: +25, or +35 if they have beds.
